ValidationRule.description: Contact2 requires first name, last name and relation to baby.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL ( StageName , "Enrolled"), NOT (ISBLANK (Contact2_FirstName__c)) || NOT (ISBLANK (Contact2_LastName__c)) || NOT (ISBLANK (TEXT(Contact2_Relation_to_Baby__c))), ISBLANK (Contact2_FirstName__c) || ISBLANK (Contact2_LastName__c) || ISBLANK (TEXT(Contact2_Relation_to_Baby__c)), $User.Department = "Inside Sales"
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: For Contact2 please provide a First Name, Last Name and Relationship to Baby.
